title: Technology-Enhanced Language Learning Strategy Design for Adolescents

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational language education theories and experience operating online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Aims to develop a smartphone-optimized language education program for adolescents, emphasizing the design of interactive structures using instant messaging

learning_goals: By analyzing adolescents' digital communication patterns, learners can design three or more technology-based interaction models applicable to language learning
A real-time feedback system utilizing instant messaging tools can be established and operated in an LMS environment
Based on case studies analyzing learner engagement structures, criteria can be developed to evaluate technology-based language learning processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
